text:
Kami berada di Bali pada Natal 2012. Kami sudah mendapatkan pengalaman buruk dengan memesan villa pribadi hanya dengan melihatnya secara online. Dalam kenyataaannya kotor dan tidak terawat. Kami memutuskan untuk pindah ke The Residence Seminyak karena kami pernah menginap di salah satu cabang mereka di Phuket. Kami sangat menikmati tempat di Phuket, karena itu kami memutuskan untuk pindah ke sini meskipun harganya lebih mahal dibandingkan villa yang sudah kami pesan sebelumnya.

Lalu kami check in dan villanya terlihat cantik! Kami berada di sana untuk 15 menit dan menyadari bahwa pendingin udara tidak terlalu efisien. Petugas mekanik memeriksa dan berkata dalam beberapa menit akan berfungsi dengan baik. Kami memberikan waktu lebih dari 30 menit dan tetap sama saja. Wanita yang menerima kami, tidak menagih kartu kami dan berkata bahwa dia akan memeriksa jika ada kamar lain yang tersedia. Karena tidak ada kamar lain yang tersedia, ia menyarankan kami untuk pergi makan malam (kami check in sekitar pukul 7:30-8 malam) dan datang kembali untuk melihat apakah pendingin udara sudah cukup dingin. Jika tidak maka kami bisa memilih untuk pindah ke resort villa lainnya.

Kami setuju dan pergi ke luar untuk makan malam sekitar jam 9 malam dan kembali pukul 12 malam (kami juga melihat beberapa villa, jika kami harus pindah). Ketika kami kembali, pendingin sama sekali tidak ada perbaikan. Kami memutuskan untuk pergi dan pindah ke tempat lain. Pada saat itu, wanita yang  bertugas menerima kami sudah diganti oleh seorang pria yang duduk di meja resepsionis. Kami memberitahu bahwa kami akan pergi karena pendingin udara tidak berubah. Sangat mengagetkan, dia berkata bahwa kami harus membayat setengah hari karena kami check out di atas pukul 12 malam. Kami memberitahu dia dengan sopan bahwa hal ini tidak pernah diberitahukan kepada kami, dan bahwa koleganya menyarankan jika kamarnya tidak cukup dingin hingga kami kembali, kami boleh pergi. Ini alasa mengapa dia tidak menagih kartu kredit kami. Pria ini menolak untuk mendengar alasan apapun dan ketika kami berkata bahwa kami tidak akan membayar karena kami tidak menggunakan kamar atau pun menginap di dalamnya, hanya barang-barang kami di sana, dia menolak. Malah memperlakukan kami buruk dan akan menelepon polisi untuk menangkap kami! Kami mempersilahkan dia untuk menelepon polisi karena kami tidak melakukan kesalahan apa pun, kami juga meminta wanita tadi yang bertugas menerima kami untuk ditelepon. Dia datang, dan mengakui bahwa tidak memberitahu kami mengenai setengah hari atau tidak memberitahu bahwa kami harus kembali pada waktu tertentu. Bagaimanapun, dia menelepon manajer dan manajer langsung berkata bahwa karena itu adalah kesalahannya maka antara kami atau dia yang harus membayar. Kami setuju untuk membayar dan memberitahu pria TIDAK SOPAN itu di mejanya bahwa tidak membayar karena kami takut polisi, tapi karena wanita menyedihkan ini bersedia membayar dan kemungkinan tidak cukup gajinya. Ini adalah pengalaman terburuk yang kami alami, dan kami tidak akan pernah merekomendasikan cabang resort ini ke siapa pun, karena bukan hanya kamarnya yang membuat resort menjadi bagus, tapi juga pelayanan dan perilaku orang-orangnya. Mereka bisa mendapatkan uang setengah hari dari kami, tapi mereka selanjutnya bisa yakin kehilangan patron dan rekomendasi baik.
title: Kekecewaan terbesar!

owner_response.text:
Dear Ratika

Thank you for your review. So much has changed since your stay, we would be deeply disappointed if this happened to us too. One of the many great things about Bali is the amazing happy and friendly staff, who now make up the team at The Residence, Seminyak. Hopefully none of our guests will ever have that experience. Just a small note though, The Residence does not have any affiliation in Phuket.

If you were to visit again, your experience would be sublime

Best regards from all of us at The Residence, Seminyak
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Saya menjalankan perusahaan terbuja dan sering melakukan perjalanan bisnis. Ini adalah pengalaman menginap terburuk saya selama 11 tahun terakhir, hanya menginap di India tahun 2011 yang paling buruk. Kamu menginap selama tiga malam dari 28 Desember sampai 31 Desember 2012 di Villa nomor 10. Saya tidak pernah sesenang itu ketika meninggalkan tempat itu sejak saya keluar dari Irak pada tahun 2009. Villa ini tidak coock pantas menerima tamu (puntung rokok tertinggal, bau got di kamar atas, tidak ada penutup kursi santai (kita harus duduk di lantai!!). Semua anggota keluarga digigit nyamuk (kami curiga tempat ini tidak pernah disemprot nyamuk selama berminggu-minggu). Tempat ini tidak bisa dikatakan sebagai tempat yang ada stafnya - semua staf jaraknya 200 meter dari anda. Sarapannya dingin (pada hari terakhir kami sarapan di tempat lain) karena dibawa di udaha terbuka dari jalan. Orang mabuk memenuhi  villa di sebelah yang berpesta sampai jam 2 makam dengan motor keluar masuk. Kami memanggil satpam dan mereka tidak melakukan apa-apa, concierge tidak mengangkat telepon - kami harus meneriaki tetangga agar mereka berhenti pada malam terakhir. Sampah di belakan villa (lihat foto)l sampah di jalan masuk ke villa (lihat foto). Harganya harga hotel bintang 5 (850 USD per malam!!!) untuk pelayanan bintang 2. Jangan mengulangi kesalahan kami, pergilah ke tempat lainnya.
title: Operasi Villa "Penipuan". Harga Bintang 5, Pelayanan Bintang 2

owner_response.text:
Dear GlobalTraveller1903

Thank you for your review. We would also be deeply disappointed if we were met with such a horrible state of a villa. The villas are now under new management, and key to everything is squeaky clean rooms, gardens and facilities, with guests serviced by smiley happy Balinese who bend over backwards to assist guests have an amazing time.

If you were to visit again, we would be sure that you would have an amazing experience.
Best regards
The Residence team
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

photos.caption: Walkway to Villa filled with Construction materials

text: Saya menghabiskan waktu berhari-hari mencari villa keluarga di Bali. Pilihannya banyak sekali, saya akhirnya memilih The Residence karena dapat memenuhi kebutuhan kami, walaupun ada ulasan yang kurang baik. Harganya mahal tapi kami bisa menghemat karena memesan lebih awal. Penyambutan yang profesional ketika saya datang dan Nyoman adalah sopir yang mengagumkan. Saya menginap di Villa Senang. Villa nya luas, tampilannya indah dengan kolam renang dan taman yang paling mengagumkan. Saya bukan orang yang suka duduk di pinggir kolam renang, tapi di sini saya melakukannya. Sarapan tersedia dalam 4 pilihan, ini banyak sekali. Luar biasa tenang, dekat dengan restoran dan pantai tidak jauh. Stafnya sangat ramah dan mau membantu tapi sedikit kacau ketika mengurus tagihan. Untuk perjalanan pertama kami dengan anak kecil (usia 6 dan 9 tahun) villa adalah satu-satunya pilihan. Aman, tenang, mewah dan anda tidak perlu berebut tempat dekat atau di kolam renang. Mereja perlu menambah Ipod atau stereo atau mungkin mesin pembuat kopi, teko untuk membuat teh. Kesimpulannya ini pengalaman menginap yang luar biasa, anak-anak saya sangat menyukainya.
title: Mengagumkan

owner_response.text:
Dear Jmac008

Great review, thank you. Much has changed in the villas, as we have taken all the comments here to heart and fixed all the things that our guests have recommended such as iPod docs, stereos, flat screen TVs with DVD players, etc, with the villas constantly being upgraded to ensure guest satisfaction. 

Best regards from all of us at The Residence
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We travelled with a group of friends from work. Perfect place   everyone had their own room  and ensuite and a beautiful refreshing pool. Our daily breakfast was included &  was great. The lady who looked after us who cooked & cleaned for us all Honey was a delight.She is always fussing after us. Thank you for looking after us so well.
title: Great place to unwind

text: We stayed in the Villa Menari at The Residence Seminyak with two other couples being taken care by our housekeeper (Hani). Great stay few minor issue (our fan was a bit loud so we couldn't have it on to sleep). Beautiful setting
title: Great spot

text:
Our family including adult children and their partners had an awesome stay at the Villa Menari.
Great location.
Friendly staff
Hot cooked breakfast with lots of choice daily.
Do yourself a favour........

partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
We stayed in Villa Siam from Dec 7 - 20, 2019. Being our 7th trip to Bali, we have stayed in various locations, yet found this villa and the staff to be our best yet.

Our staff member Made was absolutely fantastic;- kept our villa immaculate, and cooked wonderful breakfast (included) for the 5 of us daily.

No request was an issue, and Made was efficient, courteous, thorough and a lovely man in general.:-)

I highly recommend The Residence complex - the location to Eat Street, supermarkets and amenities is second to none, the admin staff efficient and proficient in speaking English, and their ability to assist with bookings for day trips / outings etc if you're a newbie is also extremely handy.
title: Fantastic villa, staff and location!
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: Absolutely spoilt with a not a thing to do. Everything you need is there, modern and nice. Friendly service and butlers that go above and beyond. Well positioned, although can be noisy at times with general traffic noise. Breakfast is very nice.
title: A+

owner_response.text:
Dear Davidseabrook,

Thank you for your review and feedback, great to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that the team took good care of you. Interesting feedback about traffic noise as it is not something that has come up before from guests, so we will take that on board, thank you. We hope you might be able to come back and stay with us again sometime.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
Not having been to Bali previously was not knowing what to expect, and initially there was sensory overload, from the traffic, seemingly suicidal scooters darting here and there, a lack of road rules.

We arrived at our villa, and from there things calmed down, away from the madness, the crowds, and the way of live we were not used to.

Our villa had its own pool, air conditioned rooms, and all the amenities you’d expect from a hotel, and then some .

The staff were lovely and attentive, (especially Sudiarta) certainly great ambassadors for the facility.

If you want to be within walking distance of the beach, it is a reasonably long way (10 - 15 min in crazy traffic in a taxi).

Plenty of restaurants within walking distance.

Would we return- certainly.
title: A Slice of Paradice

text: Excellent villa and very accommodating staff. Great location near to shops, restaurants and beach. Gorgeous bedrooms, particularly the master suite with a massive jacuzzi and outdoor shower. Having a car available was also helpful.
title: Villa amman
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: The Residence based in Seminyak is such beautiful accommodation.  We stayed in Villa Senang. The villa was just beautiful. The location is perfect - a 5 minute walk to the famous Eat Street. The Villa was very very clean and maintained wonderfully.  Gede & Ketut who looked after us were amazing.  Breakfast was made every morning with a cheerful smile on their face and let me say beautifully presented.  I have previously stayed at the Residence and will gladly make it my second home on vacation in Bali.
title: The Residence - Semiyak - Villa Senang
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
We have just spent 8 nights in Villa Zensa for the first time. We usually stay in Villa Amal’s which we love and we’re worried Zensa wouldn’t be as good.
Despite to obvious smaller size it was a beautiful Villa. The residence never disappoints.
The staff Guliah and Wayan made our stay and our children’s stay perfect.
Nothing was ever too much trouble. They are amazing!
Breakfast was lovely and delicious... We feel so happy and safe there.
The Villa was spacious and clean. Beds and lounge are a little hard. This Villa is so close to everything and all the beautiful restaurants.
The only thing I could say that wasn’t perfect this time was the new large Villas built straight across the driveway and share the driveway entrance had an extremely large amount of young people partying all night making a terrible amount of noise waking us up 3 nights in a row. Hopefully management can sort that out!
title: Lovely Holiday stay at Villa Zensa!

text: A great place to stay, very central. Accomodation was very clean and service was great. Thank you to Dwayne and Bom Bom for making our stay so enjoyable. Breakfast was delicious and Villa Shanti was lovely.
title: Fantastic

text: Best staying in bali! Welcoming, helpful and friendly staff and owner. Nice environment and perfect location. The rooms, bathrooms and living room are clean with an exotic atmosphere. We had full breakfast and the healthy dragon bowl, was very delicious and satisfying. Will come back to stay longer next time! Thanks for the great experience!!
title: Villa zensa

owner_response.text: Hello, we are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at Villa Zensa. Our team loved serving you during your stay and we hope you can come back and stay longer next visit to Bali.

LeGassick

Villa Siam

text:
We stayed at Villa Senang which was
absolutely beautiful and perfect for a family. The open plan living and pool is the best part, the bedrooms are big and comfortable with each one having their own bathroom. So close to all the action of Seminyak yet feels like your own oasis. Best part of our holidays
title: Family holiday

owner_response.text: Thank you for your review and we are delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed staying with us at Villa Senang.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Our family spent 9days in this villa. The staff was very friendly especially Dewik and Galih who gave a good tip for choosing excursions and helped organize them. Except we don’t choose one excursion to Lambongan which was disaster and cost very expensive. The breakfast was good, fresh. Only one minus after 5days we want different meniu because it's been up. But is was very good. The rooms was cleaning every single day. The bed comfortable. The villa was cozy. The villa location was very good, 500m from the main street where you can find a lot of shops and restaurants. 15min by walk from the beautiful beach club KU DE TA. One minus from villa you need to go to the main street by streets without sidewalk and light, it’s a little bit difficult with a small childrens.
title: Was good to be there

text:
We are a family of 6 adults who stayed in VIlla Amala for 5 nights.  The villa is gorgeous, clean and spacious - perfect for what we needed.  Yuli who works in Villa Amala was so helpful and nice.  I couldn't speak highly enough of how great she was.  
The location of the Villa is excellent.  We would definitely return.
title: Great villa - Amazing staff.

text:
I spent three marvelous days with my wife and my 1-year-old son at Villa Zsenza. It was like a small piece of paradise. My son could play in and out of the swimming pool for the entire day. I saw my wife smiley and extremely relaxed. We were cuddled by the villa personnel, that was very kind and professional.
Strongly recommended for any type of guests: singles, couples or families.
title: Amazing experience

text: We stayed in Villa Menari, a lovely large, spotlessly clean villa. Beautifully decorated and extremely comfortable. The pool was large with plenty of lounging room around it. The living area was large and air conditioned. The staff were excellent. Every morning a delicious breakfast was prepared and presented and we were made to feel very special. We will definately be back.
title: Slice of Heaven

text: It was an amazing stay at Villa Senang! from the airport pick up, breakfast prepared every morning by our butlers, the accomodation and staff member. Special thanks to Dewitt (asst supervisor), Widi (the front officer), Wayan (the driver), Ketut and Gede (our butler), especially Gede, who has been very accomodating. He was able to prepare a wonderful dragon fruit and lime fruit platter at my last minute request, to surprise my friend on his birthday that morning. Thanks again Gede!!! The hospitality and service at the Residence making my stay very enjoyable and relaxing. It was my first trip to Bali and definitely coming back! I highly recommended villas in the Residence for a wonderful experience in Seminyak👍🏻.
title: Fantastic stay at Villa Senang😄!!!

text: Beautiful villa, pool and staff. Breakfast prepared every morning by your butler. Comfortable beds, beautiful bathroom. Great location. Good iPod/phone docking station sound system. Very relaxing stay. Thank you!
title: Villa Zensa

text:
We stayed at Villa Menari, one of the three bedroom villas at The Residence Seminyak. There were 7 ladies on a girls trip celebrating a 40th birthday.
We were so happy with our villa, the location and staff. Perfect spot to walk to all the great restaurants on Eat St, spas and shopping. 
Liana makes the best brekky at the time of your choice. One of us who comes regularly to Bali said the pancakes were the best she’s ever had!! 
The pool was perfect temperature and size. Rooms spotlessly clean.
We can thoroughly recommend for a group or family.
title: Villa Menari - awesome location

text:
We stayed in Villa Shanty (10) this villa is amazing and the staff incredible they could not have done more for us. From the office staff to the gardeners they all worked so hard are are just so lovely, helpful and friendly. We arranged for a traditional Indonesian meal to be cooked one night for us a group of 5. Omg it was the best meal of our trip.  Much better than allot of the local restaurants. 
This place was kept so clean inside and out. Can't recommend this place enough. Thank you all for making our stay even more enjoyable.
title: Family/friends

text:
We stayed at Villa Nilaya for a week and wow what a holiday!!We were two families with kids aged between 4-8!! The villa is outstanding. I cannot express enough how amazing our stay was at this beautiful property. Very spacious 5 bedroom( we only used 4),spotless and clean, fantastic amenities, lots of ground for the kids to explore, and the staff were out of this world.They became our second family and we felt like it was our second home. Made and Tedi the butlers were fantastic. Nothing was ever too hard. They would collect groceries for us, organise dinner, organise babysitters,I got a scooter ride down to the pharmacy when needed, they looked after the kids with drinks and snacks. Widi the housekeeper was lovely and Nurul and Eka the managers run a fantastic property and the staff are just so polite and well trained. The main strip of seminyak is a short 5-10 minute walk.
Close to all the amazing restaurants of seminyak and a cab to ku de ta only cost 80cents.The pool is a great temperature to cool off when it's hot and we certainly had a lot of night swims too.
We cannot wait to return again to these villas. We used to stay in hotels but our kids had so much fun, and we found it was so relaxing that I have now been converted to villa life.i cannot express how amazing this places and what a fantastic holiday we had!!
title: Villa Nilaya-The best

text: Very close the the heart of Seminyak, well maintained villas of all sizes, unbelievable service & kindness from all workers. Big Shout out to Gede & Ketut for there amazing service and looking after us so well in Villa 1. If your looking for accommodation in seminyak the residence is definitely the place to stay.
title: Awesome villa, Nicest staff, Highly Recommend

text:
What a fantastic Holiday.The Residence is amazing VILLA set up, Secure, Quite, Private, Perfect for Families or a large group. This trip was Family and Friends, 11 adults and 2 Children (Grandkids 18mths + 7). We had stayed in two Villas opposite each other -  Villa Shanti & Villa Amman. We stayed in Shanti and WOW it was  absolutely beautiful, Tropical, spotlessly Clean inside and out. Although the holiday was fantastic on its own, what made it better then better was our Butler Dwin. Nothing was too much trouble, kind, friendly, attention to detail A1, excellent cook. I WOULD Highly recommend stay at the Villa Shanti and request Dwin for your butler.
The pool was cleaned everyday, the water was perfect, garden and grounds also great.
Our last night we decided to have all the family and friends over for a Bali BBQ (meat & Seafood). Dwin arranged it all, all we did was turn up. The Chefs did a fantastic job, the food we could not believe, plenty and cooked perfectly. If you stay its a MUST!!
Walking distance (5 to 10 minutes) to shops, facilities, Bars restaurants and more.
ALL the staff including Security, Pool Cleaner/Gardener, Cleaners and more were excellent, thank you to you all.
title: Amazing Family Holiday

text:
We stayed in villa Shanti, which is a 4 bedroom villa.

The villa is beautiful and well maintained. There is a butler in the villa from 7am - 3pm, who is happy to assist you. There's also a cleaner/maintenance person on site the same hours. Other staff come in around 5pm to spray for insects, turn down beds and switch on all lights for the night.

Staff in the complex of villas are very friendly in general and very happy to assist where they can.
title: Beautiful villa

text:
We (2 adults, 3 kids 10,9&7)have just spent 12 nights in Villa Menari. The villa was just beautiful, so spacious and had everything we needed.  
Great location! Easy walk to everything you need in terms of shops & restaurants.
Great breakfast, Liana & Made were fabulous. They couldn't do enough for us! Top notch wi fi. Great security. We recommend the residences for families! We would love to go back.
title: Villa Menari - amazing stay

text:
We have just spent 2 amazing weeks at The Residence Seminyak staying in Villa Amala.
This place is a secret heaven.Stunning Villa! This is our second stay here... We love it so much,will be rebooking for next year.
So close to Eat street but quiet enough that you get peace and quiet too. Short walk away from Ginger Moon and Ultimo corner.
The Villa staff are all wonderful. Kadek and Yuli are our villa staff, So lovely and cannot do enough to help. Just beautiful with our two young children.Even the gardeners and pool cleaners are wonderful. They feed the fish with our children each morning and chat to them.Couldn't recommend it enough. Thank you to all the staff and management! We can't wait to return.
title: Villa Amala - Absolutely gorgeous stay

text:
We spent 7 nights at the Villa Shanti and had a wonderful stay. Our butler Dwin was awesome. He was very friendly, helpful and catered to our every need. He even organised a surprise cake for my birthday which was totally unexpected. The other staff Wika the House-keeper, Nursana the Gardner and Dewa the Pool Attendant kept the place immaculate during our stay. The Villa was a wonderful place to stay with large beautiful clean comfortable spacious rooms  with very nice bathrooms and good air conditioning. The living quarters were also very spacious and bright looking out onto a large magnificent  pool. The Villa was very private with 24 hour security. The location was good with a short walk to Eat Street with many restaurants and shops and the beach isn't much further.  We would definitely stay again. Thank you Dwin and all the staff for making our stay thoroughly enjoyable.
Paul, Jo & Madi
title: Villa Shanti - Amazing Stay

photos.caption: The view you are greeted with when entering the Villa Shanti

text: Just spent 11 nights at the Villa Annan. The villa was magnificent and the staff couldn't be more helpful. A big thank you to Komang and his staff for all their assistance during our stay and especially on the day of our wedding.  The villa is located right in the heart of Seminyak and only minutes from 'Eat Street'.  The best place I have stayed at. All our friends who visted the villa couldn't believe how good it was. Will be back again.
title: What a Wonderful Place to Stay

text:
I booked us for 4 nights at The Residence Villa Zensa and I am really glad I did. We had a fantastic stay. 

A nice handy location but we felt we were in our own quiet space with an amazing Villa and pool. 

Having our own wonderful staff who prepared breakfast each morning was just lovely. They even worked out it was my husbands birthday party and surprised us with a cake. 

We were very happy to stay here and hope to come back soon.
title: A great stay in Villa Zensa

text:
We had 8 of us staying in a villa and WOW!
The villas are beautiful inside and out, the staff go above and beyond to help you have an awesome holiday from bookings, taxis, breakfast daily, even looking after your laundry needs!
Will be recommending to all my friends and family!
title: Best place to stay!

text: We have just returned from an absolutely blissful stay at Villa Shanti, a 4 bedroom private villa which is part of The Residence, Seminyak. The Residence is a 100m walk from Seminyak's famous 'Eat Street' with all it's restaurants, shops and bars. Amazingly quiet our four bedroom villa was the perfect place to escape and relax. Our wonderful house staff, Dwin our Butler and Wika, were just fantastic. Our breakfast served in the villa even morning at our preferred time. Choose of fruit and Indonesian or Western breakfast, juices and Bali coffee. The rooms were spacious and spotless. Most days we lazed around the pool and gardens of Villa Shanti; we just didn't want to leave. The Residence, Seminyak offers other 2,3,4 and 5 bedroom villas all with the same excellent high standard and service. We definitely give Villa Shanti and The Residence, Seminyak a 10 out of 10!
title: Absolute bliss is the mist of busy Seminyak.

text:
We recently stayed at Zensa villa in seminyak and thoroughly enjoyed our stay! Good location, very clean and spacious, air conditioning in all areas which is a must and not very common in a lot of villas that have living and dining outside.
The only downfall was the pool was a bit hard to get in and out if as there is only one ledge and then straight into full depth, so not a good place for children or elderly. We did not have kids so it was ok for us but could see problems for people who do. A hand rail would have been helpful to assist in getting out as there is nothing to hold onto.
The butler service was excellent having cooked breakfast each day was awesome! Gahli and Dina were lovely!
Make sure u use mozzie spray too as there seems to be heaps hovering around the lounge area outside.
Overall though it was very enjoyable and would definitely stay there again!!
title: Zensa villa

text: Had such an amazing time - the villa was more than what I expected - private - clean - breakfasts were top class - well kept gardens and property - Dwin was such a gem - I am already planning my return holiday.
title: Absolutely wonderful

text:
Best Holiday Ever, the Residence is amazing , we stayed in the Villa Shanti and it was superb, absolutely beautiful, spotlessly Clean and our Butler Dwin was incredible . Highly recommend, you will not be disappointed, on our last night in Bali , Dwin arranged our BBQ Feast, we could not believe how much food there was and it was beautiful, a definite must.
We will be back again next year 😃
title: Highly Recomended

text: My 3 friends and I stayed in Villa Jepun at The Residence Seminyak for 1 week. We had an amazing time. The location of the villas is perfect - within walking distance to eat street and a $3AUD taxi fare to Potato Head, Double Six Beach etc. The service provided by the villa staff was exceptional. The villa was kept very clean, every night they would come and spray the rooms for mosquitos. The staff could not be more helpful. The villa itself is great perfect size for the amount of people. The villa created the perfect getaway for my friends and I - it was extremely relaxing. I only have one slightly negative point which is that the beds are not the softest and the pillows were also quite uncomfortable, but other than this it was a truly relaxing and beautiful experience and I will definitely be staying at the residence again!
title: Villa Jepun - Extremely Relaxing Week Away!

text:
Ok sometimes you come to a place the first time a you think wow 😳 
Second time at these villas and haven't been disappointed at all. 
This villa is as good as the first one.
The service once again was fantastic breakfast 🍳 each morning cooked in your own villa.
title: They have done it again

text:
Had a great week here with the family in two villas
Breakfast and airport transfers were included and the staff were absolutely wonderful

We had private pools and it is walking distance to great restaurants 
Taxis are easily to get at the entrance to the villas and the staff will order for you and call you once it arrives
Bluebird Taxis are very cheap and have a 70 cents flag fall most want a $3 minimum most of the time we gave $5
Uber is there but they are so cheap don't forget the give the driver a good tip as they have better cars that generally can take 5 or 6 people. 
Bali Taxis (the company) you need to watch and make sure they put the meter on as will try and get you for $15 and so we always avoid them in Bali and stick to Uber or Bluebird 
If you are looking at Villas in Bali I can certainly recommend The Residence
title: Centrally located Villers

photos.caption: Pool and outside area in our villa
Pool and outside area in our villa

text: We went to Bali for a friends wedding and we had the whole street of The Residence Booked. It was an amazing place where we felt very safe and a short walk to Seminyak Square and beach. The only faults in Menari's main room were that the bed needed a pillow top cover to give a little more comfort and there were no bedside lights. We also found in the wardrobe area needed more lighting. Apart from these few things we had such an enjoyable stay with Liana and Made cooking breakfast every morning and did our housekeeping too. The pool was fantastic. We would certainly stay there again.
title: Villa Menari

text:
We just had an amazing 5 night stay in Villa Amala.  The villa, pool and garden areas were amazing, and we were looked after extremely well by Kadek and Yuli.  Nursana and Widarta always had the garden and pool area looking extremely welcoming especially when getting back from a hot day out shopping.
The only thing we found worrying was the tiles around the pool were a little slippery if you weren't careful.
Would definatly recommend friends and family to visit The Residence
title: Villa Amala

text:
We are back from our 7 nights stay at Villa Menari. The villa itself overall is nice and spacious. Yes, some of the furnitures are a little bit outdated and need to be replaced, plants near the pool are nice but they need to be trimmed so it doesn't interfere when we're sitting by the pool. But these are just minor points.

We love how the villa is located in a very strategic area. Less than 10 mins from Seminyak Square and Village. Two convenience stores are located literally next door. 
The villa is secure and quiet. Thanks to Effendi who's always at his post and very helpful in giving directions, etc.
Breakfast were made daily by Liana, Made and Komang on time! Food was good, but maybe a bit more variety in the menu would be better.

The best thing about this villa is the pool! We used it everyday as the water looked so inviting. Cleaned daily by Dewa and Suardana. Well done!

Made and Liana also helped us with our shopping request and sending parcel. Their great service were always accompanied with smiles! True balinese hospitality.
Adi from the front desk was also very helpful with our request for international power adapter.

Last point, mozzies weren't really a big issue for us. Aircon really helped with mozzies, except im the living room since it's a bigger area. Bring your mozzie repellent just to be safe.
title: Villa Menari

text:
We had a wonderful time in Bali. This was made so by the fantastic staff at Villa Shanti. Dwin was our butler and looked after us extremely well, he was so obliging to every detail of our stay over and above our expectations. We would definitely recommend Dwin and his services. We wish we could take him and his family home with us.
The villa was maintained by Dwin, Wika, Dewa, and Nursana daily and was immaculate, all of the staff take great pride in their work.The photos on the site were exactly what we saw in person, which was a huge relief as well as a huge reward. A very peaceful and private oasis.
As we were a group of only females having the security was very comforting, thanks Evendi for keeping us safe. Not once did we feel uncomfortable or uneasy within the Residence compounds.
Reception was extremely attentive and were a great help when I lost my phone, although I never found it they were thorough in their efforts. Thanks Widi and Suyasa for your time and assistance.
Our time here went too fast but we do definitely and absolutely suggest other people should come here.
Many thanks, Terima Kasih
Narelle, Dione, Sylena and Tayla
title: Girls family trip

text:

Especially Dina the young girl that greeted us each morning to cook our breakfast 
It was a pleasure to wake up each morning , in fact all the staff at our villa , Ardana the Gardener Widardta that cleaned the pool , Dwin that showed us around the other villa's for our next trip , we will definitely be back , nothing it to much trouble , easy walk to eat street , the Beach or for a Massage 😄😎😍

text:
We stayed 4 nights at The Residence, Seminyak in the 3 Bedroom Villa Menari. 

I can't rate this stay highly enough. 
Everything from the booking, to check-out went smoothly and was a breeze. 

We started with an email from Yunie who was extremely helpful recommending the best villa for what we wanted. 

Then, when we arrived they organised the transport from airport at ridiculous o'clock which was included. 

I'd like to give special mention to the people who made it special all together. 

We were surprised when the next morning we were greeted by 'Liana', our in-villa chef and cleaner who always went out of her way to ensure everything was perfect. She made us breakfast every morning in the villa on time each day, when requested the night before (also included in our booking) and was quick and quiet when she went about her cleaning each morning. 

'Made' was our butler who was exceptional. 

'Dewa' inspected, cleaned and adjusted the villa's pool each day ensuring it was kept in amazing cleanliness and beautiful colour. 

'Suardana' pruned, tidied and watered the gardens also daily. 

All the above mentioned people made the place look amazing every day when we returned from our adventures and this made us feel special in turn. 

I would also like to thank the lady at reception who's name has escaped me, though she was very helpful when recommending local places and even secured some rental scooters for us (delivered to the villa with helmets and all) 

Thankyou all and we hope to stay again!
title: Amazing stay. Can't rate highly enough

text:
We travelled from Australia to Bali and chose Villa Amman because of its size and appeal. We were not disappointed with our choice as we found complete relaxation and wonderful staff who made our stay very comfortable! I would like to say thank you to our friends starting with Mr.Naba Nyoman, a wonderful chef who took the time to teach me to make traditional Nasi Goreng. Mr Komang was another great chef, who also trained me to make this dish, as we cooked it together on both occasions (Had some great laughs and fun doing so). I came back to Australia and made it, family agreed it was the 'real thing'. The chefs there are truly good people who make a wonderful breakfast for the whole family, never late and always just as you requested! I cant go with out mentioning our other friends in the 'Amman team'. This is Era and Ari, our house keepers, who will go and get stuff for you, help you if you need them and go out of there way to take care of you. The gardener Madr Kus and Wayan the pool man maintain the property to perfection. Ok, so the home is a spacious 4 bedroom villa which is separate to the family areas. This is great if you have visitors or want to watch movies, listen to music etcetera.. The master bedroom has a huge spa in it, although we all weren't sure of what rooms to take, given they are all fabulous! Needless to say, kids didn't get the master!! The kitchen is well equipped, modern and spacious, as is the dining room, which is large for bigger groups or visitors. The pool is always a good temperature (In Bali it would be) and the home is quite safe. Security checks cars as they enter the facility, and contact you on the villa phone to approve access.
My only regret is our time was short, but given the opportunity, we shall definitely keep this treasure in mind for a future visit.
title: The staff are excellent, the accomodation is great and level of relation and care is perfect!

text:
I stayed in the residence at villa Jepun for 7 nights for a much needed girls trip! Being my first time traveling to Bali I was nervous and unsure of what to expect! We were greeted at the airport by our lovely drivers who made a fantastic first impression for Bali! 
As soon as we set foot in our beautiful villa, the lovely Eka (supervisor) and Kadek (our butler for our stay) greeted us with refreshing beverages and made us feel right at home! The villa was more than enough space for the 7 of us and more importantly nice and cool which was much needed in the hot Bali weather! During our stay the villas cleanliness was maintained everyday which was a massive bonus!! We had Yuli come and do house keeping each day, the gardener Made also came to make sure the garden was always in impeccable condition for us and Wayan also cleaned the pool everyday!! I was so surprised and grateful for the amazing upkeep of the villa. 
Kadek and Galih our butlers were always so punctual with breakfast and always so polite and cooked us some delicious meals to help us get through our day!
The staff were also so helpful in helping us make bookings for restaurants and activities, special thanks to Widi the front desk attendant for so helpful during our stay! 

The villa is also very close to seminyak square (10 min walk) which made it the ideal location for us! 

The staff at the residence and our lovely villa definitely made this trip a memorable one! Thank you so much for your hospitality and hopefully we can visit you again!

I wasn't convinced I had made the right choice when I booked a villa at the Residence Seminyak. But I was so wrong. Our beautiful villa was lovely and spacious, the decor was modern and beautiful. The beds were comfy, bathrooms beautiful, a very well equiped kitchen and a great pool area.

title: A great stay at Villa Amala

text:
I was part of a group of 7 friends who stayed at their 4 Bedroom Villa Amman for 8 nights. I honestly just don't know where to begin!
From the get go, we were greeted at the airport with two great drivers with spacious, clean and, most importantly, cold cars.
Even though we didn't reach the Villa until 11pm due to flight issues, both our Butlers greeted us upon arrival with lovely fresh beverages and cold towels. They then gave us a very good house-keeping address emphasizing the extent to which they would go to make our stay as pleasant as possible (which they certainly did).
To keep this short and simple I will do a very brief Pro's and Con's.

Pro's:
The service is impeccable.
Villa is spacious
Pool is plenty big
The outside areas are perfect for relaxing
The location is second to none. 200m walk to Ultimo restaurant and central seminyak strip. Perfect distance to still have peace and quiet but not miss out on the fun. 

Con's:
The Jacuzzi doesn't have proper heating.
title: Perfect Location. Exceptional Service. Amazing Villa.

text:
Stayed here for one week with a group of friends and we were definitely blown away by the villa - especially the staff! This villa was the perfect size for the 7 of us and we felt welcomed right away thanks to Eka. 

The villa itself is very clean as you would expect as they have house keeping everyday (thanks to Yuli), comfortable (awesome couch), really good surround sound for music and movies, awesome aircon, and the pool was the perfect size. We were very lucky to have breakfast cooked for us every morning and our butler Kadek was so lovely and sweet! Staff was also very helpful with booking restaurants, drivers and activities for us.

Location wise was also good as it was only about a 10 minute walk to Seminyak Square and restaurants.   

By the end of the trip this place actually felt like home thanks to all the wonderful staff - Widi (front office), Wayah (pool attendant), Made (gardener). It was great to witness first hand the amount of effort that has been put in to maintain this villa and we were honestly so sad to leave! The staff here really made our trip unforgettable!

Will stay here next time without a doubt. Highly recommend!!!
title: The Perfect Villa!

text:

The staff had an airport transfer which was wonderful after traveling 32 hours from the states and they greeted me with a refreshing drink and tour of the property.

The property will coordinate any activity you desire or a driver. I have already told every one of my friends that travel and will be planning on going to ballet o stay at the residence of seminyak. There was nothing about this property that was bad. The location was great, the street is full of villas, its secure and its only a 5 minute walk to everything you want to do in trendy Seminyak. I can't wait to return to bali to stay here again.. 

NEVER STAY IN A HOTEL IN BALI when you have this place.

text:
These villas are just beautiful.  The staff are attentive and fabulous, particularly Kadek, Yuli and Dewi from villa 4. 

The only criticism I have is one that is common all over Bali... the tiles around the pool are glossy and so extremely slippery when wet (which going to happen around a pool).  Dangerous when you have children who aren't great at remembering not to run (or even walk fast) around the pool when wet.

The rooms are huge and cool, the bathrooms are stunning, the living area is really well sized and the kitchen is well equipped (even though I had no intention of using it).  Breakfasts are yummy, one morning I thought the staff were late to come and prepare them, turns out I was wrong, they came in prepared them and got them on the table without me hearing them!

Our kids were welcomed.  Our daughter became unwell with a double ear infection and tonsillitis, when we thought it was only a single ear infection the staff went and bought us antibiotic ear drops, returning quickly and not charging us extra for the convenience.  When we realized it was more severe, they organized a Fr for us who arrived within 15 minutes, which is awesome when you have a screaming 5 yr old.

We have had laundry done in Bali, through our villa in the past, and were stunned by how expensive it was, we had it done here and were charged exactly what the laundry charged, no inflated charges.

Security was exceptional (after being stung at another villa in the past, this was important), we were confident that we and our belongings were secure at all times.

We will most certainly aim to return.
title: Stunning

I've just returned from 10 days in Bali staying at The Residence, Seminyak and have to say without any doubt that this is the best holiday accommodation I have ever stopped in.

The villa (Villa Menari) was spacious, bigger that it looks in the pictures.  Three bedrooms all with an 'outdoor' bathroom / shower. Pool, TV's, DVD player, Aircon (essential) and sun terrace.

We were met by our villa staff - Made & Liana.  Both of whom were amazing throughout the holiday preparing our breakfast each morning, ensuring our villa was cleaned daily and any issues were resolved.

The location is great. Just a few minutes from Eat Street.  There are a number of small supermarkets nearby (use Circle K as we were ripped off in the Mini Marts). Seminyak is extremely busy but sat in the villa you would think you were in the middle of nowhere!

The only downside we found was that the villa only had 2 sunbeds.  We asked for another but there were not available.  Not a massive problem as I am not one to lie in the sun all day but should there be 6 people in the villa could be an issue.

Overall an amazing place to stay, we will be back to Bali one day, will we stop at The Residece again?  100% yes.  And I will be recommending it to others too.

text:
We stayed at the Villa Amman for one week with four adults and two children. We were picked up from the airport by the Residences, and were welcomed into our villa by Eka and Komang our butler with a welcome drink and cool towel. Nice touch, they then proceeded to explain the villa to us and we were left to unpack and get comfortable. Our first impression was wonderful, but then slowly issues arrived. 
We had one morning where when we woke the pool was half empty!  In their defence they dealt with the issue swiftly, but it meant we had up to 9 staff in our garden for part of the day! Then we returned from a wonderful day at the Waterbom Park, ran a bath for the children, to find there was only hot water! Thank heavens we didn't put the kids in the water without testing. Our bedroom was upstairs and our shower was moody from day one and really never improved despite their efforts. The beautiful outdoor spa, used on their website, is perhaps not as beautiful as it is meant to be! Not enough hot water to fill it up, we used the kettle to warm the water, no heater on the spa, and the water was gone the next morning due to a leaky plug! So we gave up on the spa! 
If you wish to hang anything in your bathrooms to dry bathers etc: there are no hooks, although when we mentioned this to the management we were given some wooden rails, which worked perfectly! In our shower, nowhere to put your soap and or shampoo, as where the bathroom downstairs had a little shelf in the shower. No soap dishes in the bathrooms, the Villa's supply product in little bottles, but we preferred not to use this strongly fragrant products! Although the villa's are very spacious, and give you the feeling of grandeur, the rest doesn't match the description. As mentioned in many other reviews I read, not one on The Amman in all of the 50 reviews I read, Many complain of the darkness in the rooms. The lighting is shocking and if you wish to read in bed, bring a book light or if you wish to pack or etc. open the curtains! Ours were almost blackout, but in the main bedroom downstairs, the curtains were lighter and orange, and it meant they woke every morning early! We also found the bed very hard, uncomfortably so! 
The setting is beautiful especially at night, the position ok and within walking distance of Eat Street, however too far to walk to the beach with small children. 
Would we return? No! as the villa's were full, we could not be moved to another villa, as where at a hotel, you have more options. I also am a person who prefers to 'see out' and the villa's are surrounded by 12 foot fences, which made me feel a little 'caged'! 
The daily breakfasts were delicious, although we decided to have breakfast out twice to brake the routine of the small choice menu.
On the plus side, the main house id fully airconditioned and there is an ability to fully open the house with sliding doors or have it closed and cool! I had to ask for an umbrella as there was no shade by this pool, we found the sun beds quite uncomfortable, but the children were given many blow up toys for in the water, nice touch. 
Our villa was adjacent to a private villa with barking dogs, which were quite noisy at times.
title: First impression is WOW, but then.....

owner_response.text:
Dear ZoZo

Thank you for your detailed review which is very much appreciated. We apologize that the pool had an issue - we had to replace the deep well pump and then change the distribution of water into the villa - by way of an apology, we did give you a complimentary late checkout so that you could relax in the villa before you flight in the evening. The jacuzzi in the master bathroom is acts as the master bath, and needs the staff to turn on the hot water as its so big.

We will source extra lighting for the bedrooms as suggested. There does need to be walls around the villa for privacy and of course security. The upstairs bedrooms look out across Seminyak as does the upstairs living space, however, Seminyak is a residential and commercial neighborhood where you find all the top restaurants, shopping, bars etc, so a room with a view means you would have to be much higher - Bali has a 4 story maximum building height policy, hence all the buildings are quite spread out on one or two floors.

Staying in a villa is a different experience to staying in a hotel - one of the key reasons is that people are always together day and night - no need to make plans to meet in a hotel restaurant for breakfast, no sharing of the pool or facilities, no hidden costs - just you and the family with lots of space.

We shall endeavor to fix Amman as quickly as possible with all your requests

Best regards from all of us at The Residence Seminyak

text:
We recently stayed in Villa Senang(number 1) for 7 nights with a group of 24 who were all scattered throughout the residence in different villas(number 8, 3, 1, 12 I think) The location was fantastic and we were right in the heart of semilyak so it was a short walk to shops, semilyak square  and great restaurants. The  pool was fantastic with a huge outside area and lots of different seating there was a day bed next to the pool and another day one on the second storey as well as a large outside couch, sunlounges and a wicker circle bed, the pool was shaded most of the day which was also a plus and all the 4 bedrooms had there own ensuite.  The living area was also large and spacious. We had the master bedroom downstairs which was really huge with a large full ensuite but the security lighting around the pool all night was a problem as our huge sliding doors only had shutters and this was not enough to block out the light so if you are like me and like total darkness to sleep then do not choose this room the other problem with the master bedroom was that we could not lock the  door from the inside which I was not comfortable about. 
Our butler was Gede he did a fantastic job every morning with our delicious breakfasts and putting up with my husbands weird sense of humor which he did seem to understand and enjoy.  He was always there if we needed him.  Kutet was our housemaid who we did not see a lot as she always seemed to be able to clean our rooms without invading on our privacy.  Thankyou Gede and Kutet for making our stay so enjoyable
title: Villa Senang (villa #1)

text:
We stayed in Villa Menari for 7 nights, although our group of 20 friends were scattered between various villas within the complex. 

Villa Menari is a three bedroom villa, two large master bedrooms and a third bedroom which can accommodate two children or be changed into a double bed. My partner and I shared the main master bedroom, large in size with all the modern amenities you would expect from a four star villa. However, we had sleepless nights due to poor light block out within the bedroom. The room has six large windows with thin shutters that do not close properly due to age. We also had shutters on the bedroom and ensuite doors, again more light entering the room. The security lighting which surrounds the villa at night floods into the bedroom, we were advised this lighting could not be switched off, thus we slept in a disco and woke every morning at sunrise! I would suggest proper block out blinds on top of the shutters as people generally come away to rest and we came home extremely tired. 

I would also suggest locks from the open air bathrooms outside to the inside  bedrooms. I didnt feel comfortable not being able to lock the door at night.

The pool was lovely with hanging ferns and the upstairs gazebo was a lovely spot to read. The villa was furnished well and we particularly enjoyed opening the doors along the villa to enter the pool.

Great location, five minute walk to eat street and the best coffee in town 'Grocer and Grind'. Around a 15 minute walk to the beach.

The highlight of our stay was most certainly the staff. A very big thank you to Made for our delicious breakfasts, I loved walking out of the bedroom to hear your 'good morning wishes and see your lovely smile. A very gracious gentleman who left no stone un-turned. Thank you Made :) We will miss you. Also, thank you to Liana, Ira, Dewa and Suardana. The ladies kept our villa spotless and were never intrusive in their manner. Thank you team for making our stay warm and lovely.
title: Villa Menari - Great Staff

text:
The Villa (Zensa) itself was lovely. The staff on the ground were excellent, especially our butler/cook and our house boy. They gave exceptional service and were helpful and very friendly. The gardens and pool are attended to every day and the guys doing this were also very friendly. The villa was very clean and tidy and well look after.The location was very good, close to "Eat Street". The guys on the front security gates were also very good and made notes of all out taxis coming and going, which makes you feel a lot safer. And they always greeting you with a smile. Next door to this Villa complex was a private house and the owner have about 5 dogs. They bark a lot and about 5 or 6 in the morning they are very noisy....all barking very loudly. They seem to be at their worse when the owner come home and again when they leave in the mornings. This is out of the control of the Villa complex...just letting you know.
But the pool was unsafe and very difficult to get in and out of as there were no steps. You were expected to haul yourself up 1.5m to a ledge and then drag yourself up another ledge to get in or out. This may be OK if you are fit and in your 20's, but not for anyone else. When we mentioned this to the villa staff, their comments were "no one has complained before". We discovered later from other local staff that a number of other guests had complained before. The local staff did not want to address the problem and passed it on to the management team in Bali. The general manager did visit and was a bit bemused by our complaint. We asked to be moved to another villa but were told no. "We had paid for a 2 bedroom pool villa and that is what we got". The fact that the pool was not able to be used seemed to be our problem. After much discussions they decided to place a light step ladder into the pool, weighed down with a bag of rocks and then place a bed sheet around a pole so we could drag ourselves out of the pool. (see pictures).
Would I stay here again ?  Maybe, because the local Villa staff were very good...but definately not Villa 8.
title: Very Nice Villa - Unsafe Pool

owner_response.text:
Dear Peter

Thank you for taking the time to write your review. It was a pleasure hosting you at Villa Zensa. 

We do apologize that your stay with us wasn't perfect. Some of your comments however are not correct. The pool step is 1meter only and the second step out of the pool is 0.3 meters. As soon as we heard that you were having problems with the pool, our staff did advise you that they were unable to move you, simply because all the other villas were full. Our management team visited you at the villa immediately and started to look for a solution to help with your pool access. The Balinese have a tendency to agree to everything guests say, but in reality, in the 7 years we have been managing the villa, we have never had a complaint from anyone trying to get out of the Zensa pool. You should note that virtually all villas in Bali do not have hand rails out of pools simply because they don't look great, preferring instead to have steps leading out of the pool. We provided a step ladder within 24hours to assist your pool access and additional assistance to help you stand up - our staff were also on hand day and night, if you needed physical assistance to enter or exit the pool. 

Our Balinese management team checked on you every day to make sure you were fine plus our senior manager regularly visited to ensure your wellbeing and comfort - at no time did you ever mention that dogs were barking which disturbed your peace. We have fantastic relations with the local community and could have immediately asked the owner outside the villa to control his pets. Our guest’s wellbeing is so important to us, that anything inside or outside the villa can be remedied. 

We do hope you returned home safe and well

Just returned from a wonderful 10 nights at Villa Nilaya (The Residence).
the Villa is just perfect for 10 persons (5 beds).  My husband and I had the separate bungalow and it was a great experience.

Breakfast is cooked in the kitchen every morning, You choose what you would like and what time the day before.

The staff are so amazing, Garli and Cummin were simply amazing, Always helpful and never intrusive. On the first day after they realised we were from Australia they put up a Christmas tree with lights and even a few gifts for the kids. So unexpected and so appreciated.

text:
We travelled to the Island of Gods, Bali in 2009 for the first time to welcome the new year that awaited us.

It was tricky to travel in December as it is a wet season in Bali (bring a brolly). However, our accommodation more than made up for the slightly glum weather. We arrived to a beautiful resort nestled in the heart of the sophisticated Seminyak, Bali. The Residence is a quiet and secure gated development comprising  fully serviced villas with a private pool.

Breakfast is cooked at your villa  and served at the table right by the poolside every morning. It's almost like waking up to breakfast-in-bed which was heavenly! Afterwards one can enjoy a swim before heading out to explore the town area. Close to Kuta and Legian which are 5-10mins away by cab, it is the perfect location to be at. If you are feeling adventurous, you can take an evening stroll or rent a bike to get around.

If you would like to chill in your villa, you can also request for room service from the restaurants around the neighbourhood. Do ask the concierge for the menu for restaurant options. Although I would personally recommend checking out the night scene, there are many nice and fancy restaurants offering anything from local to fine dining. 

Be sure not to miss out Kudeta where you can have a lovely romantic dinner in this fine dining glassed-up restaurant by the beach, and enjoy cocktails and the breeze after that. Reservations are recommended. 

While you are there, do try and catch a sunset dinner of seafood by Jimbaran, which is about 45 minutes from Seminyak by car - you won't regret it!

An excellent choice for those who want the convenience of being close to the best collection of boutiques, international restaurants, entertainment spots and the Bali beach.
title: Truly THE residence.

Best regards from all of us at The Residence, Seminyak

Upon arrival our family was collected from our first villa and treated to cold water and towels.   Check-in was swift and friendly.  

Our Villa:  We booked the 2 bedroom deluxe villa that was perfect for our family.  The den had been converted into a third bedroom so we each had our own room.  The villa was stunning with a large pool, great upper deck, fully stocked kitchen and two fantastic bathrooms.  The fridge was stocked with soft drinks, beer and snacks all at a very reasonable price. The grounds were well kept with several pieces of stone art.

Service: The front desk service was very helpful and professional.  Villa service was good but a little inconsistent throughout our stay.  Breakfast was served in our villa in the morning at for the most part was good.  (had a hard time with the poached eggs, one day scrambled, one day hard boiled but really not a problem)  Overall the staff was very friendly.

Location:  We loved the location, as it was a short walk to the main street and a quick taxi ride to the beach.  

Overall the villa was the highlight.
title: Great Villa, good location

owner_response.text:
Dear 37338

Thank you for your detailed review. Noted regarding the eggs...We now do as much training as possible, in fact it never ends to try and constantly provide great service, including breakfast.

Best regards from all of the team at The Residence
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We stayed in villa 10 for 5 nights over Easter.  Villa was great - it was huge with four bedrooms and three bathrooms over two levels.  The pool was fantastic, bathed in sunshine all day long.  There was also an extra deck area up stairs.  You could easily have 8 people staying here and not feel like you were on top of each other.  The staff were friendly and attentive with only only concern being a mix up with the 'maxi bar'.  If you buy anything (drinks etc) from the shops make sure you bring this to the attention of housekeeping.  Location was great, just a short walk up from Ultimo and right around the corner from Bodyworks and all the great new restaurants alongJl Petitenget.
title: Huge villa in great location

owner_response.text:
Dear frequentlyflyinfirst

Thanks very much for your great review.

Noted about the maxi bar, which nowadays is the fridge, guests just let us know what they want prior to arrival and we stock the fridge including beers and soft drinks plus anything else they want - a much cheaper and better option than hotels where the cost is pricey.

Best regards from all the team at The Residence
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We stayed over the new year period and the villa was located in the heart of Seminyak, juts a couple streets off the main drag of Seminyak/Oberoi area. 5 mins to all the popular haunts.

Its was a very busy time of the year being NYE and all, so we hope that the service levels sufferred as a result. The villa was severely understaffed and unless you book early or in advance for transfers, breakfast...etc, as staff tend to need reminders, and attention to details were a bit of a challenge. 

The villa is not too child friendly (we had a 2 yr old) so keeping an eye so that nobody goes tumbling into the pool was a full time job. 

The driver recommended by the hotel was "functional" but could not suggest if prompted for suggestions, and certainly did not offer information about the places we were heading, it costs US$50 (incl taxes) per day for 10 hours, which we subsequently found out was probably on the high side.

Overall ok, location was central for those wanting to be in seminyak/oberoi, but a bit planning and would've got a better place for the money.
title: Good location if you want to be in busy Seminyak

owner_response.text:
Dear SGnomads09

Thank you for your review. Much has changed w=since you wrote this review. The villas are now western run, where constant attention to detail are very important plus training in all levels of staffing - Guests are now welcomed by a great team, and the villas are all in very good condition. We have a maintenance team on 24/7 alert should anything go wrong and a western management team available to assist at any time.

Best regards from all of us at The Residence
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We spent 3 nights in the two bedroom deluxe villa 105. The size of the villa is definitely amazing. Big swimming pool and hugh bale upstairs. The manager is very nice, she upgrade us to deluxe villa for free with one guest bedroom locked, and romantic set up was in place when we checked into the villa. The rate she offered is also good. 

However, the facility is more of a serviced apartment type villa, you don't expect hotel level service. Room service doesn't replace the toothbrush and toothpaste. The towels are clean I guess, but the color is not very pleasant. My wife and I got about 20 mosquito bites from the first night. There is no mosquito net and the bathroom is outdoor and there is big gap between the sliding doors.  We ordered breakfast one night in advance for the next morning, but the staff still forgot to show up. We had to call a couple of times to push them. The free WiFi is available, but it doesn' t work when you turn on your laptop. You need to manually reboot the wireless modem located by the swimming pool every single time. The manager explained to us that such defect is caused by unsteady Indonesian infrastructure. But the free WiFi in Royal Pita Maha where we're staying at now seems to work all the time. The service here also overide The Residence Seminyak by far. 

All in all, if you're traveling with friends or family, and don't expect high end service, I do recommend this villa since the value and size are very good. But if you travel with your girlfriend or wife and expect perfect experience, I do not recommend this villa.
title: Okay experience

owner_response.text:
Dear Chinadude

Thank you for taking the time to write this review. 

Much has changed since your visit and now we aspire to offer our guests a 5 star service with all the villas in tip top condition - Wi-Fi in Bali is much better and our free service in the villa is very good. We have taken note of all our guests comments and fixed all the villas where people have highlighted recommended changes.

If you were to visit us again, you would see an amazing difference
Best regards from all of us at The Residence Seminyak

text:
Fab family friendly villa in great walking distance to eat street.

We were a travelling party of 2 families which included 5 adults and 2 kids under 8. This villa provided comfortable accommodation for all. The draw card for us was the proximity to Seminyak square and the ability to walk to most places we frequent while in the area. 

Villa Amala was located in the back section of a private driveway which was well maintained. The villa itself was very well appointed with a large open planned kitchen dining lounge area overlooking the pool.  4 guests were accommodated in the main structure which comes with one bathroom, shower and bath with the remaining 3 guests staying in the master bedroom.

Yuli our villa house keeper was super friendly, helpful, thoughtful and courteous.  Big thank you to Yuli and the team!

The villa was kept very clean and tidy.  It was fab to have a water cooler plus all utensils needed to cook for fussy kids. 

Minor things of note - we rarely used the upstairs chill area, pool doesn’t get much sun so it’s cold and finally the next door neighbours dogs chose to bark randomly at night and wee hours of the morning for extended periods almost every night which was super annoying. 

We have visited Seminyak annually for over 8 years always choosing to stay in different areas for a new experience. This villa and the workers were lovely 😊
title: Villa Amala - Family and Friends

text:
As always we had a wonderful stay at The Residence. We were greeted with a beautiful smile every morning from Liana and all the staff here, from the Gardener to Security.
The Villa is beautiful and clean and nothing is ever a problem.  We were close to cafes restaurants all within a 1-2min walk. Taxis were also easy to get from the Villa.
Everything was provided here, toiletries, towels, water, insect repellent and a full kitchen all under the one roof.
Thank you to everyone who made our stay so special.

text:
Great insulated villa in the heart of town, perfect for some quiet relaxation time with all the amenities of the city closely. It was our first time visiting Bali, had a great time with my wife, and our close friends.

Cutting to the chase :
[+] Means good ; [-] Means bad. 

[+] Free shuttle ride to and from the airport
[+] Welcome drink upon arrival
[+] Very friendly and accommodating staff attitude
[+] Daily cleaning services
[+] Daily breakfast freshly cooked on site
[+] Varied breakfast menu (choose one day before)
[+] Fried rice, fried noodles, and Bali coffee were among my favorites
[+] Clean environment
[+] Large and deep pool
[+] Butler services available from early morning until 3PM
[+] 5 convenient stores withing 5 mins walking distance
[+] Restaurants, clubs, and shopping districts within 15 mins walking distance
[+] Beach within 15 mins walking distance
[+] Fully equipped kitchen (large fridge and microwave)
[+] Large King sized beds in all rooms
[+] Overall spacious environment with high ceilings (cooling)
[+] Constant soothing water flowing ambient sounds from the pool and ponds
[+] Secured location with 24/7 guardhouse and CCTV
[+] Large family room with TV
[+] Ample cabinets and safe in each room
[+] Large bathrooms and toilets (strong bidet pressure)
[+] Pool towels and toiletries restocked daily
[+] Laundry (paid) service provided by the staff
[+] TV is HDMI compatible
[+] Pool does not reek of chlorine, feels like fresh water
[+] Staff will leave the air condition on after cleaning (you'll come home to a nice cooled room)
[+] Staff able to help with impromptu transport bookings, McDonald's delivery orders and home massage appointments

[-] Air con unit in the first bedroom on the second floor, above the glass sliding doors into the study room was leaking waterfalls during our last day staying here
[-] Some of the paintings (dining area, and first bedroom on the second floor) were a little creepy looking - eerie smiles and blacked out eyes
[-] Limited hot water supply (especially when we came back from the beach and had to all shower at the same time ; definitely not sufficient to fill two tubs at once)
[-] Limited shower water pressure, at times fluctuates
[-] TV placed at an awkward location (during the day, the reflection of the transparent white curtains across the room on the TV screen makes it impossible to watch TV properly) effected me the most due to my high astigmatism
[-] No rooftop deck and gazebo compared to the other Villa selections @ The Residence
[-] Weekly fogging during the day, can smell pretty bad (the staff will warn you before it begins)
[-] Almost every window/bedroom door is covered using wooden folding binds, they are sometimes not 100 secure and at certain angles, people from the outside can see through them into your room
[-] Shared bathroom on the second floor, the folding binds are not 100 secure, people can see the bath tub and shower area clearly at the right angle
[-] Overall interior design could use a little more decor, Shanti Villa seems to be less Balinese compared to the other Villas on selection @ The Residences Seminyak
[-] This unit in particular has no BBQ pit / equipment ready, although the Villa does provide dinnertime BBQ services (BBQ equipment had to be rented at cost @ 45USD per night)
[-] Stray cats that entered the villa were not people friendly

The positives far outweighs the negative points, but I felt like it needful to write everything down regardless of how big or small the points were. Overall wonderful experience. 

Me and my wife stayed in the second floor first bedroom for 6 days and 5 nights.
title: Shanti Villa - Quiet Getaway in the Heart of Town

text: We stayed in Amala 3 villa and it definitely ticked all the boxes. The villa is stunning and cannot find fault with anything. The rooftop deck is a rare find in Bali. text:
We went as a group of 26 for a 60th birthday celebration my family of 8 stayed in the Villa Senang, and could not fault it in any way.
Short walk to eat street, shops, restaurants and markets. At the enterance there is a small supermarket and across the road is a great place to have a massage.
The villa itself was fantastic 4 bedrooms all with own bathroom and our room had a bathroom semi outside, the pool was just perfect with a type of spa at one end.
With the help of housekeeping Ketut and our own private Butler Gede we wouldn’t have had such a great time.
Gede was a great cook, serving up the best pineapple pancakes I’ve ever eaten, the dragon fruit bowl was a wonder of colour and the Nasi goreng was the best my family had eaten.
Gede helped out with booking tours and transfers, he was such a great help, we now think of him as a great friend.
I would highly recommend this Villa
title: 60th Birthday Celebration

text: A group of 4 adults and three children aged 15months to 6 years stayed in the beautiful Villa Senang for 8 nights recently and found it just superb. The villa was very clean and well maintained and it worked well for our party of 7. Our butler Gede made the stay for us all from cooking what our kids decided were the best pancakes to helping us making cocktails or just delivering cups of tea by the pool, Gede made everything easy. As did all the rest of the staff at the complex. The villa itself was very comfortable, the pool was large and the cabana on the side the best place to while away the day. We hired a pool fence while there. It was metal with a security gate and was set up for our arrival by the villa. Senang is at the end of the driveway so it was quiet and away from the hustle and bustle. We had the inhouse chef cook us dinner in the villa twice while we were there, it was so good and great value and made us feel very special. We also used the babysitting services hiring a nanny, Putu and her daughter Angie, over 2 days and it worked really well, the kids loved them and we felt happy leaving our little ones there while we went for massages and grown up time! I would definitely recommend Villa Senang to families wanting some rest or just a luxurious holiday. Hopefully we will be back.
title: Rest and relaxation

text: A group of 15 of us stayed in 3 separate villas for my 40th Birthday. What a fantastic place to stay! The accommodation was beautiful, particularly the gardens and individual pools. The Villas had everything we could ask for and the staff were so friendly and helpful. Breakfast daily was delicious. Could not recommend it enough!
title: Beautiful Villas

text: Our stay at Villa Jepun was relaxing and peaceful. Made our Butler and Wayan our housekeeper made sure we were always looked after and provided us with any request we needed. They always greeted us with a happy smile and breakfast was cooked to perfection. These villas were within walking distance to the main strip of shops which came in handy, would highly recommend and we would definitely stay here again.
title: Our relaxing stay

text: We went with a group of 15 adults and three children for our friends 60th birthday. We hired two villas to cope with the amount of people celebrating this special ladies birthday. The villas were fantastic, each villa had four bedrooms each with their own bathroom. The villa that we were in was for the "oldies" and the pool was not graduated but suited our needs. The villa with the kids had a pool that was graduated - each villa was ideally suited to the ages of the people that were staying in them. Our rooms were serviced every day.  Breakfast was served in the main living room by very friendly staff. They wont let you do the dishes even if you are just trying to help!!!!  I recommend the dragon fruit bowl - it was yummy!!!!  The villa is centrally located in Seminyak, you can walk to the beach, takes about 20 minutes.  If you want to shop get a taxi and ask to be taken to the main shopping strip - cost is only $5.00. There is a bar and a small supermarket at the entrance to the villas where you can order food and get cold beer. You can get a massage, buy some sensational art pieces, and get one of the best Chinese meals from Happy Chappy's just up the road. I highly recommend these Villas, you will not be disappointed.
title: 60th Birthday Party

text:
Villa and rooms are amazing.
Pool is fantastic.

text:
What a Great family Holiday!

The Amala Villa is extremely spacious, modern and clean.The pool was the main attraction with lovely plants and garden. A open rooftop terrace that created a beautiful opportunity to grab a glass of wine and find your zen.

I highly recommend the Amala Villa it will leave you wanting more....Miss you guys already and we will be back.😊

text: The villa that we booked was much better than expected, we had a beautiful pool and outdoor area to relax in the sun and the interior was just as good, we had three bedrooms two bathrooms, an outdoor shower and an outdoor bath as well. The service was amazing, all very nice people who always meet our needs and more. We had a butler that made the best breakfast for us always with a smile on her face. A few things on the menu included, nasi goreng, Pancakes, eggs, fruit salad and fruit juice, tea, coffee and a lot more. text:
This was our second stay at The Residence. The first was in Villa Nilaya (highly recommend) and this time, due to less people travelling with us we opted for the 4 bedroom Villa Shanti. The Villa is well equiped, very spacious and kept very clean by the amazing staff. We mainly had Dwin and Bom Bom (I think) looking after us and they did a fantastic job tending to our needs and looking after us. Thanks for all of your efforts. 

A special mention must go to our good friend from Villa Nilaya, Made. Unfortunately for us there was a slight hiccup at the airport with our transfer and we ended up having to use the Blue Bird taxi service. My wife accidentally left our passport wallet in the taxi with 5 passports and a large amount of cash. We didn’t realise until late at night on the night we arrived. Obviously we thought it was gone and never getting it back. We then contacted Made and told him the situation. His efforts from the moment we told him were nothing short of extraordinary and to cut it short he managed to track down the driver and arrange for him to drop it back to us. From the bottom of our hearts we can’t thank Made and the driver enough for their efforts and their honesty. We will definitely be back. 

Thanks, From Paul, Cami, Sienna, Judd and Mila

text:
